Articles.Content:
tied to laod ksp this morning but for some reason it just keeos geting stuck on the first loading screen with a like 5% of the bar loading then freezing there the imig role is still runging so ksp is still runing but just not laoding i have tried uninstaling and re instaling and cheking for updates computer off and on again outher games load fine it is just ksp i havbe never had this problem befor at all it has always run smoothly can any one help

thanks
Welcome to the forum @WelshManGaming, is this a problem with the vanilla game or do you have mods installed?

it was vanial i had to unistal steam but it is working now

thanks

3 minutes ago, WelshManGaming said:

it was vanial i had to unistal steam but it is working now

thanks

I'm happy you have resolved your issue and I have moved this issue from KSP discussion to Tech Support (PC, unmodded) in case anyone else has this problem.
